changes.change: Added Dratnos' routes as Demo routes (with permission).

• Freehold
    • An Awakened Obelisk was not properly linked to A/B week, causing it to sometimes show up twice. This has been corrected.
  • Shrine of the Storm
    • The Awakened Obelisk at the 3rd boss has been placed downstairs where it actually is.
  • Temple of Sethraliss
    • Brutal Awakened Obelisk was accidentally placed twice - one has been replaced with the correct one.
  • Tol Dagor
    • An Awakened Obelisk was not properly linked to A/B week, causing it to sometimes show up twice. This has been corrected.
Imported Awakened Obelisk path + icons were not linked to the obelisk - this caused trying to re-set the link to not remove the previously set path + icon.
Tol Dagor: Cutwater Strikers are now imported properly (a bug in MDT causes this).
Siege of Boralus: Kul Tiran Footman are now imported properly (a bug in MDT causes this).
